articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as England play South Africa in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: England v South Africa - clips, radio & text

articles.description: England's Rugby World Cup campaign is entering uncharted territory as they brace themselves for impact with one of the game's superpower.
articles.title: England face up to World Cup day of reckoning

articles.description: New Zealand's skills and smarts proves too much for an outclassed Argentina in their Stade de France semi-final.
articles.title: All Blacks tell Test rugby's oldest tale to make final

articles.description: Wales' 17-year losing streak to Canada continues despite a gritty performance in Wellington.
articles.title: Gritty Wales lose WXV opener against Canada

articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary as the Netherlands play Sri Lanka in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: Listen: World Cup - Netherlands v Sri Lanka

articles.description: Ferrari's Charles Leclerc takes pole position in a tight qualifying session in the United States Grand Prix, with Max Verstappen down in sixth on the grid.
articles.title: Leclerc takes 'surprise' US GP pole position

articles.description: England's white-ball team returns to the scene of a memorable victory against South Africa when the two teams meet again on Saturday.
articles.title: England hope Mumbai return can ignite campaign

articles.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp says his excellent record in the Merseyside derby will count for nothing on Saturday.
articles.title: Klopp's 'uncomfortable' reminder of derby record

articles.description: England pick up an early wicket against South Africa as Reece Topley gets Quinton de Kock for four with just the second ball at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: Topley dismisses De Kock second ball

articles.description: Australian Kaylee McKeown breaks the world record in the women's 50m backstroke at a World Cup event in Budapest.
articles.title: McKeown breaks women's 50m backstroke record
